moves.name: Hex
moves.effect: Its power is doubled if the target is affected by a status condition.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.effect: Has a small chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: A Tale of Triumph!
moves.effect: Drastically raises the user’s Speed. Sharply raises the user’s evasiveness. Leaves the user burned.

syncMove.name: Dark Tales of the Shadow Ball

passives.name: Unhindered
passives.description: When the Pokémon attacks, ignores damage-reducing effects on the opponent’s field of play.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up moves in a pinch.
